name: Max Morita
text: Listen here, I’ve been to many restaurants that are similar to this here mellow mushroom. However, in my 60 years of eating at fine establishments of this sort, I have never come across such a caring, goal oriented, loving, inspiring, and …More

name: Cynthia Haliburton
text:
First time dining at this restaurant because it was always so busy during lunch time.
Decided to go later in the afternoon at 3pm. …More

name: Holly Smith
text: I ordered three things and they were all absolutely amazing. I called my order in at around 5:40 p.m., and I specify that I did not want to pick it up until 6:20 pm. Because that is when my hotel could give me a ride there to pick it up. My …More

name: Corey Dilorenzo
text: Brier creek mellow is by far the best mellow mushroom in Raleigh. Being that we ordered 3 pizzas on a Friday night we expected a decent wait time but that was not the case. What felt like an instant our food came out fresh and picture …More

name: amy eckel
text: First time I have gone to a Mellow Mushroom.   Definitely will go back again!  The food was excellent,  good drink selection,  fun atmosphere.   Very friendly staff.

name: Madeline Kinnisten
text: Best pizza place in Raleigh! Must get the frozen jack and cherry coke if you go! soooooo good. The vibe is so cool and service is excellent. Pizza is amazing perusal. 10/10 experience and will be returning! Would recommend sitting outside it’s a nice vibe and they have heaters so it’s perfect for the fall!

name: Shay Baggett
text: Mellow Mushrooms everywhere are always an experience. Each one seems to have a different ~vibe~ and I love all of the ones I have been to so far, especially this location! The wait is a little long but I can wait if it means that I get the …More

name: Taylor Jones
text: Mellow Mushroom is a fantastic pizza spot. It's pretty deep into Bier Creek but if you know, you're in for a treat. My friend and I got the spinach dip and shared a great pizza. Great for dates, groups, families and kids! The staff is wonderful.

name: Taye Rogers
text: I visited this location with my fiancee along with my three nephews who are all boys. Ages 6,11, & 12.  Needless to say, we all enjoyed ourselves and the food.  Our waitress was amazing and the food was very good.  Between the color scheme, …More

name: alex douglas
text: Mellow mushroom was one of my favorite places to eat. No longer the case. I drove all the way from Chapel Hill to get to-go from this location. Waited over an hour to get my food (no biggie, I was excited). When I get my pizza (The Shiitake …More

name: Roy Bruce
text: The food is normally always five stars.  There was a kitchen issue on our last visit that caused for a slightly lower rating.  The issue caused for a long wait.  The food was good though - no issues there.  The management was very understanding and apologetic.

name: Heather Hager
text: I loved coming here and would meet my friends here at least once a week simply to get the bacardi rum cherry coke slushie. Now they switched it out to some gross peanut butter whiskey we have been back once since finding out about the switch. So sad, please bring back the rum

name: Joao Valladares
text: Let me explain u what happened that frustrated night! It was my cousin beautiful, she is my sister first, she was so excited to visit ure new location on Briar creek, when we got there my family feels the negativity from the manager on …More

name: FatKidsDontRun
text: Very busy location! Call ahead of time as this place is often packed. Staff is patient. Delicious pies, cooked to perfection, good ingredients, made right on time. The location is artfully done and has a very enjoyable atmosphere.

name: Amanda Jo
text: Love this place! Very unique, creative art! Definately a perfect place for a date night. Looking forward to checking out the other locations as well! Pizza and beer delicious!

name: tjcnc60
text: Ample parking.  Sit down service took forever.  Server took 10 minutes to take order.  Food took nearly an hour to arrive.  Quality was ok.  Somewhat bland.  Check took nearly 15 minutes to process.  During the visit we noticed take out orders moved a lot faster.   Overall, can't recommend for a sit down meal

name: Steph Rice
text: We had been excited about trying this location out and we're quickly disappointed. We came to eat outside with our dogs and were told that dogs were not allowed even outside. I have been to numerous Mellow Mushroom locations and had never …More

name: Beth Sanford
text: I ordered a pizza for pick up via phone at 7:30. I was told it would be ready at 8:15. No problem there. I arrived, paid, and was told to wait in the parking lot. I waited in the parking lot until 8:45 before going back inside. I was told …More

name: Jikku Alex
text: Really nice place. Pizzas are great. Good staff. We get pizza from here when we crave pizza.

name: Kelli Oldham
text: Always and repeatedly a great experience at the Brier Creek Mellow Mushroom. Crust quality and consistency can be a challenge at other locations. But this one has never let me down!!

name: sierra stroebert
text: Went for pizza and drinks, had an amazing experience. Pizza was perfect and the ambiance was awesome. Will be coming back.

name: J D
text: Hit or miss!  Had some great pies here, some dissappointly bland ones as well.  Service and wait times have also varied widely. Roll of dice, but fortunately for them Brier creek doesn't have a lot of great pizza options.

name: Kathleen Koechling
text: Delicious pizza with some unique specialties. Good gluten free crust, paper straws, cute decor and friendly staff. Great salads. They made me a Magical Mystery Tour pizza (portabellos, pesto, spinach and jalapenos) even though it wasn't on the menu without any directions from me.

name: donna long
text: Food is always amazing no matter what city I'm in. Great selections and can't beat all the ingredients they offer. I had placed on line a nd it wouldn't let me select delivery.  I called the restaurant directly and spoke with Ivan the …More

name: Emmett H.
text: Pizza was made with fresh ingredients and made to order.   Nice ambience (indoor/outdoor patio).

name: Alex Martin
text: Beautiful location.  The pizza was as perfect as you would expect from a Mellow Mushroom.

name: Anouar Habib Chorfa
text: Stuff don’t care about delivery orders. One hour since  order was placed and still not ready. Never go to this place. Other locations way better service and quicker!

name: Lesley Simmons
text: I love Mellow Mushroom but this location definitely has some work to do. Two bad experiences in a row prompted me to leave this review. The first was with the quality of the pizza - overcooked, thin, uneven crust and sloppy. Maybe they got …More

name: DOMENIC MUTO
text: Food was super amazing tonight. Had the steak hogi. Rachel our waitress was super amazing. And Ivan, what can I say about the manager. Wonderful personality, great with people and super accommodating with my meal and our concerns. My second time coming to this location and will continue coming back.

name: Dani T
text: Before we moved to the area this was out favorite place. When we learned there was one in our neighborhood we were stoked! First time going since covid started and it was a horrible experience! My husband ordered a large pizza with a salad …More

name: Rob Knight
text: I love this place!  Always great service, great food, great atmosphere!

name: Sarah D
text: We love Mellow Mushroom pizza. The Raleigh and Durham locations are awesome and we have always had amazing pizza. This location opened up much closer to us so we started ordering pizza from here to be picked up. No idea how this has …More

name: Isabella Dimino
text: The pretzel bites are absolutely to DIE for!!!! And staff is the sweetest and really professional. They remember my name every time I come in, I couldn’t be more happy with my food. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!!!

name: Karyn & Peter Rivera
text: Been here twice since they opened. The food is great. The servers are very friendly and know the food they are serving. I just don’t understand why it takes forever to get our food. I also can’t understand why it take the manager involvement for our food to come out.

name: Kimberly Worley
text: Best pizza ever! Pro tip, order a side of cheese sauce to dip your crust in!

name: Brittany Keltner
text: Wonderful pizza. We will be back when in town next.

name: Lila Lawson
text: This Mellow Mushroom is new to Brier Creek, it's down the street from Chick-Fila. We went for lunch and there wasn't a wait. This place is pretty big and there is plenty of parking. We enjoyed our food and it was all made fresh and served hot. Our server Lindsey was excellent!!!

name: CAROLYN Tourney
text: Great services. Pizza need to be baked longer.

name: Sheila Crouse
text: Servers were great but the pizza took forever and we saw so many takeout orders go before ours.  The pizza was under cooked and bland.

name: Bob Hooley
text: The food is really good, but their service is awful. We have tried this place a few times to give it more chances but are let down every time. I would give it a lower rating, but the pizza is good if you don’t mind the terrible customer service

name: Emma Daniel
text: Super friendly staff and even though they are wearing masks I can definitely tell their smiling under them. They are following all COVID guidelines and like another user said, it’s a top-notch place.

name: China Evans
text: My family and I love mellow mushroom, but this restaurant did NOT meet our expectations. We waited for 10 minutes to be greeted by our waiter. I finally had to go to the hostess station and inquire about the waitress. Secondly, after our …More

name: Scherrie Kennedy
text: I had heard good things about this restaurant so I ordered via Ubereats.  I had selected "no mushrooms" on my order and also listed that I had a mushroom allergy.  My food came slathered in mushrooms.  I guess that will teach me to order …More

name: Samantha Fortner
text: We've given this location two solid tries since it opened. Both times our family has arrived well ahead of the dinner rush (4pm) and yet it's taken 10-15min just to get a server to greet us, let alone take an order. The service is awful. …More

name: Mandy Kolar
text: I dined in tonight with Q, Patrick, and their trainee Ryan. They were all very attentive with their service. I had a half and half specialty pie that came out amazing. They suggested a 26 Acres Reptar Juice and it was DELICIOUS! Ivan, the …More

name: Nick Darone
text: This is by far the best Mellow Mushroom location I've been to. The food is noticeably fresh and delicious! The atmosphere here is awesome too. I wish we ate by the fire, but that will happen next time. Bob was our server and he was amazing! …More

name: Peter Rivera
text: Food was great! Our food took forever to arrive. Might be because we pointed out that line cook was not wearing face mask.

name: Bryanna king
text: Food was good. But covid 19 state law protocol was not followed. Server took mask of and touched face may times at servers station and then touched our drinks and food to bring to table. Also, busser was not wearing a mask. Table was not sanitized before they re sat a table with another group.

name: Robin Hockaday
text: Good pizza very fresh and tasty! Good service tried for first time will be back

name: Steph Hobler
text: Stopped at Mellow Mushroom tonight and had a large half white and half vegetable pizza.  We were quite disappointed when the vegetable half was not cooked as asked... (well done veggies, please). …More

name: Marry Mills
text: Immensely disappointed in the level of service at the Brier Creek location. I placed an online order (already paid for with an included tip) at 5:25 with an estimated ready time of 5:53. I didn’t arrive until 6:25. With that being said my …More

name: Lynell S
text: Great atmosphere! Good music played the whole time, at a reasonable volume (rare for pizza shops!) and the decor was lively but not overwhelming. The food was delicious, and the alcoholic drinks were fairly poured. You can tell the team …More

name: Gravity Child
text: This place was the best pizza restaurant on Brier Creek when it opened since it's standards have fallen. I give 2 stars in hope that they can improve the pizza and food quality. The pizzas are lacking toppings and the cheese doesn't cover …More

name: Tony Oneal
text: I have to say, I have made several visits here and have never been disappointed.  The service and the food is amazing. The server that I had was crystal,  she does an amazing job.. thanks crystal for making my visits enjoyable.  I will definitely be back

name: Mike C
text: Excellent service during all 3 of my visits

name: Deer Park
text: I came into the restaurant with febreeze and everything and they helped me ensure the whole facility was germ free, they disinfected my table then wiped it down with sanitizer and as I watched my server take care of my food he followed …More

name: Brandon Cone
text: Mellow Mushroom Brier Creek location was an excellent choice! I was greeted when I walked through the door and was sat without a wait. My server Kelly O. was amazing! She had a bubbly personality and suggested a good appetizer and beverage …More

name: Brent Ingram
text: Got to love Mellow Mushroom, this new store is awesome they have great art everywhere, and much like all the other stores the food is delicious!

name: Lauren Willoughby
text: From walking into the door you are greeted with a smile by Brendon - who was so kind and helpful suggesting a great local pizza! I loved his energy and attitude.. made the experience great from the start!! He deserves the 5 stars and is literally the only reason I came to write this review!!!

name: Randy Compton
text:
Food 5 star
Staff 5 star
Restaurant is newly built 5 star

name: Heidi Hobler
text: Great food! Great service!

name: Jeff Lippert
text: Great pizza.  Had a "build your own" and made my fave - Italian sausage, mushrooms, onions and green peppers.   Ingredients were fresh and crust was perfect if a tiny bit thicker than I prefer. Friendly bartenders and locals.

name: Kaitlyn Boeckel
text: I’m a huge Mellow fan so you know I have to hype up their food, and this location did a great job with it! I also feel like going to a MM is an experience and I love that their workers are allowed to express themselves/be spunky and …More

name: Anita Galins
text: Food was delicious and wait staff, Nicole, completed the wonderful dining out experience!

name: Deets Hatfield
text: Many delicious dishes on take away menu.

name: akshay gupta
text: Always great pizza, no exceptions.

name: kwadwo ofori
text: I like mellow mushroom. The food is good. I've had the calzone and I like it. I've been there a few time and all the waiters have been very nice. Interesting ambience, a mishmash of industrial, psychedelic and modern elements with …More

name: Amanda Brennan
text: I love this mellow mushroom location. Kelly was my server and she was so sweet. Kelly had great recommendations for food and beer. My favorite pie is the funky q chicken.  😍

name: Brian Mullis
text: Great food.... some of the younger employees not attentive up front however as long as the food remains this quality we will continue to visit

name: Jonathan Casals
text: Brand new place in Brier Creek. Amazing food great service!  Convenient right off of the 540. My family and I will come to visit many more times.

name: Ms T
text: Loved going to this place with my group of coworkers on a Friday after work. Good food and drinks and nice atmosphere. Always crowded though.

name: Bryan Sasser
text: Great food and service as always!

name: Angela Dunn
text: My first time there. Food was good

name: Alicia TigerGal
text: GF crust wasn't the best. Toppings always are the best though.

name: Thomas Kendall
text: Been here a several times now.  They are missing the signature margarita, which just seems odd.  They also seem a bit more sparse with the meat toppings than the Mellow Mushroom in Cary.  Service isnt bad, but definitely not stellar.  There …More

name: Ronald McKenzie
text: ok, a goid pizza,  just overpriced

name: Peggy Flowers
text: My family visited Mellow Mushroom last night to celebrate my grandson’s birthday. The “heated patio” was freezing! Our food was ordered a few minutes after 6 pm. It began arriving about 7:15 & my salad which they totally forgot arrived at …More

name: B Marski
text: Delicious pizza and friendly staff.

name: Donna Backshall
text: So glad we finally scored a Mellow Mushroom here in NW Raleigh. And it's a pretty one too -- lots of creative lighting, patio seating with cool gas fireplaces, a true upgrade from the typical Mellow Mushrooms you see near college campuses. …More

name: Leslie Hall
text:
Special shout out to Joel and the Mellow
Mushroom team for all of your support today as Leesville Rd Highschool played in the 4AA state football championship. Your support help feed 300 Leesville loonies at the pregame tailgate.  We are all big fans of the Mushroom.  The pizza  was fantastic.

name: Jaime Fernandez
text: Such a great Mellow! Service was amazing! We walked in with a group of about 20 after soccer. Everyone was sweet and helpful, fast and the food was great. They kept us all separate for checks and they have an awesome outdoor space for the kids to play! Thank you Mellow!!

name: Alicia Belcher
text: This is a new restaurant, open since April 2019. It still looks brand new and did not have much business on a Sunday morning. It's at the airport end of Brier Creek and we had a fantastic time. There is a fenced children's play area, more …More

name: Devonne Owens
text: Food was awesome and so was my company.

name: Jim Elliott
text: Typical MM. Nice staff, good food.

name: ava lakkas
text: host was super friendly and great service

name: Lou
text: The staff here is super friendly and service is great. Their specialty pizzas are all delicious and their drink selection is nice too. My go to pizza place when Im in the area!

name: Kevin Howell, Sr
text: I ordered curb side and I had to go in after waiting 15mins and then called..they asked me to come in. I did not have a mask and was asked to go back out. The jerk chicken did not have enough jerk sauce. Everything else was ok.

name: Cynthia Lucas-King
text: The food was extremely fresh and my waitress, Morgan was very patient and professional

name: Eduardo Neri
text: Very pretty place, good service but very expensive for pizza

name: Paola Lunardi
text: Bria and Q were awesome! Also, thank you for being sensitive to others’ dietary restrictions even though I have none. More importantly, thank you for using biodegradable straws! ❤️🌍🐬🐢❤️🦋

name: Jamal Jones
text: Ordered food online at 6:27. Got there at 7 had to wait 15 min in parking lot for 2 items. Should it really take 40 min to make 2 items when you're not busy. Slow service and way overpriced. Will not be going back

name: Jessie Cookson
text: Wow! We went to the mellow mushroom in brier creek the other day. The food was absolutely deliciousness. I was there with two fellow coworkers and 4 children. We were sat at the back of the restaurant. No complaints. It was perfect because …More

name: Wes Bolton
text: Mellow mushroom is a cool place to hang out after work or take the family. They have a great tap selection and low key bar area. The pizza isn't your average pie, and there are a ton of delicious options. I really like the Funky Chicken and …More

name: Ray Watson
text: Wait over 30 minutes to be seated, once the nice waitress arrives she informs us that if any one of us orders pizza it will be one hour before our order is ready. Hard understand........  busy, but this is a pizza restaurant!!!

name: Ronald Bradley
text: Solid experience, and consistent food in regard to the other Mellow Mushrooms I've visited. I got the Kosmic Karma + Meatballs, and it was ferocious l delicious. The decor was pretty lean, imho, so I'd give the environment a 6/10. …More

name: Eric Schmidt
text: My 1st MM experience. Top notch staff, great food, nice building, and the elusive frozen coke and Jack machine! Delicious.

name: Ethan Jarrell
text: The food was delicious.  But the staff was amazing.  They were super nice.  We have three small kids and they were very accommodating.  On the way out, a waiter who hadn't even been at our table told us to drive safely going home.  Above and beyond for sure.  I would probably go back even id the food wasn't good.

name: Levi Washburn
text: I have enjoyed every visit; Top notch bar service. They have unique decor and make you feel totally comfortable. Large round tables create an  excellent group atmosphere. Stop by if you are looking to chill with friends over good pizza. (I like their half subs too since they make a great lunch)

name: Christian Drotor
text: First time to this Mellow Mushroom. The experience was great! It was my brother in law's birthday. The server was nice and the food was delicious. The restaurant is designed very well. From the cool bathrooms to the lighting in the restaurant, this joint is  so chill.

name: Donald Bauman
text: Food was great, but service was just OK.

name: Christine Smith
text: If you’re at the bar, definitely ask for Evan Almighty!!!!!!

name: Heather Wells
text: Food is great. They are knowledgeable about celiac disease and gluten free handling procedures. The outside patio was fabulous. It was a perfect fall evening and it had a heater. The server, although I didn't get her name, was excellent.

name: Sally Jernigan
text: Great pizza, good service. A bit pricey but worth it. Our 4th visit. Will return.

name: Selvia Gabay
text: Food takes soooo long to come out! But it’s SO good. I recommend the holy shiitake pizza. Yum! It was so good I can’t go back to eating regular pizza anymore.

name: Kirsten deVries
text: Great pizza! Our server was very attentive and gave good recommendations. Love the atmosphere.

name: Michelle Ross
text: People are friendly, the food is amazing, and the drinks are too!

name: Jason Smith
text: Great Pizza.  Good beer selection.   Friendly staff and management.   Overall a solid pizza shop.   Salads are good as well.

name: Robert Pickett
text:
Went to mellow mushroom today.  We had a large group so we were given order numbers.
After a 45 minute wait,  my waiter,  who previously had taken my appetizer …More

name: Ardean Smith
text: I was highly disappoint, when I placed a order for curbside pick..I arrived on the posted time from there website. I call inside to let them know I was there..AFTER WAITING minutes pass my scheduled pickup time, I went inside..first they …More

name: Susan Dodson
text: Went here for a work event on a Friday around 2pm. The party of 30 was seated out side on their patio. The weather was lovely and the service was excellent! There were about 3-4 servers coming around for drink orders and the pizza was brought to the table promptly. The pizza was delicious! And the drinks were perfect!

name: Cheryl Chapman
text: Wait is always long for take out

name: 44Jwatts
text: First time going to a Mellow Mushroom. Went for lunch with my wife, the wings were great, pizza was good too. We loved the atmosphere. It feels like a great location to either bring your kids for a meal or go out with friends and have a drink or two.

name: Jaimie Hardy
text: Tim was such a wonderful waiter, very friendly! We love coming to mellow. Yummy food, great drinks, fast service!

name: Evan Small
text: Great pizza. Cold beer. Very clean establishment. Fast service.

name: Cindy Wolf
text: I only stopped in four a drink snd an appetizer. I was amazed at how delicious the appetizers were and how gorgeous the presentation was.  Get the portabello mushroom!  The server was quick and pleasant, perfect.

name: Justin Reyes
text: I've eaten at other Mellow Mushrooms and this one does not come close to the quality or taste of the others. Both the pizza and hoagie we ordered were just not good. Disappointed that I won't be returning to this particular location.

name: Michael Demby
text: Better than expected! The regular cheese pizza is like a yummier Ellios pizza. Our server Bob brought the fun and made it amazing!

name: Brittany Murdock
text: Probably the best Mellow I have ever been to. The food is always good as well as the drinks. The manager is so friendly and always walks by to check in.

name: Brian Garlington
text: Restaurant was clean and the food was very good.  My wife has a sever gluten intolerance and Mellow Mushroom never upsets her stomach!

name: Erika E
text: We waited for an hour to be seated. I had to go to the front to ask to have a waitress come help us. When the waitress finally came to the table, she informed us that it would be another 45 minutes before the pizza would be ready!  We had t even ordered drinks yet. Won’t be going back.

name: Rob Eckley
text: Great food, great service. So many beers on tap and in the bottle, my bartender was extremely helpful and knowledgeable about all the different types.

name: Pamela Kierstead
text: Great food and service was fantastic!

name: Jennifer Mitrevski
text: This location needs to step their game up. We’re trying to help restaurants out but this is the SECOND time in a week our order was wrong. Tonight we got the wrong salad and a hoagie we asked for things to be left off, completely ignored. Complete waste of money. We’re done, plenty of businesses in Raleigh we will give our money to

name: Melissa Dehnel
text: I can’t rate the food because it never got that far. We got there at 5:15. Were told it would be a 25 minute wait. Not bad. An hour later we finally get a table only because we kept bugging them about it because it was sitting empty in the …More

name: Angela Patel
text: Great family friendly pizza place.

name: chris gordon
text: A wonderful experience I am happy I went there . Beautiful restaurant great staff and of course the food 5star service great we will  be heading back to that Mellow Mushroom very soon

name: Amy Arcos
text: This crust is magical!!! I knew MM was good, bit had never been. When we got one here in Raleigh I was excited to try and it did not disappoint.  Not everyone at my table were in love with the crust like I was, but I was in LOVE with that crust.  It's like nothing else I've had on pizza.  The mushroom soup is also divine.

name: Dom DePompei
text: Ate here for a work function with a group of about 30.  They had us out on the patio which was a strange experience for me since I'm from Cleveland and patios in November aren't really an option.  This was great though, it did get chilly …More

name: m3 trik
text: This isn't the Mellow Mushroom atmosphere I've had in the past.  Now it's starting to feel more than ever like a generic franchise, fake, overly family friendly, and topped off with cheesy music from the 90's.  It really felt like I was in …More

name: The Homesteading Hiker
text: Best mellow mushroom I’ve ever been to! Food was extra delicious and service was top notch.

name: Javier Mercado
text: Excellent Pizza!👍👍👍

name: Denise Berry
text: It usually takes a while to get your pizza at Mellow Mushroom, but if you do have to wait, it's still worth it! Such delicious crust. Remember to ask for dipping sauce so you can enjoy the crust even more!

name: Andrew Fish
text: The food was amazing while the service exquisite. It was very clean, and had an interesting decor rather appealing.

name: Derek Sawyer
text: Love this place, great food and quick service. Been 3 times in the last month and everything was great each time.

name: Chyna C
text: First off the waiter rushed us with picking our pizza. After 40 minutes of waiting (he said it’d be 20) for our pizza we weren’t brought any napkins and when I asked for garlic for my food he never came back to tell me if they had it or …More

name: ted brown
text: Anniversary with my lovely bride!

name: Jenna Durham
text: great food and service!!

name: Britany Leggett
text: Wish there were more healthy options on the menu. Service was just mediocre. Atmosphere and location is great

name: Eric Stanley
text: Great place for lunch

name: Whitney
text: Delicious pizza and wings! Great customer service! I love walking up to the pick up counter and seeing that beautiful blue tile.

name: E K
text: Top-notch place.

name: Ebis Argueta Gamble
text: Service was excellent!!! Our server Fatima made sure we had everything we needed! Food was also very good!!!

name: Shawn Murray
text: Food is always good.  I definitely recommend the pretzel bites with the Beer Cheese!  It's awesome.  Waiter was slow for the restaurant being 3/4 empty.  But the food made up. For it!!!!

name: Ryan Coleman
text: Dined there last night, we were on a time limit trying to make a movie and the experience was great!! Genesis was our server and she made sure we had everything we asked for and she kept us up to date on our food time . Food was great as always we will be back!

name: Arthur Dones
text: First time there with the family and loved it. The place have a great atmosphere, an outside area to eat as well. The restaurant is classy, with a bar. Me and my family of 6 ate and we bring leftovers, I order two long island ice tea. Which is the best I had in any North Carolina bar I ever been.

name: Brittany Dervan
text: Delicious pizza. The gluten free pizza is also very good for being GF. Very friendly and attentive service. A little on the pricey side. Nice atmosphere inside and outside. We'll be back, often! …More

name: Sasha Mackey
text: Delicious and great service!

name: Pat Peruso
text: It's still a new location so I don't think they've found their 'rhythm'. There were 5 of us today.  There was a good 15 minutes between the time the first two entrees were brought to our table and the last one finally arrived.  Food quality was good!

name: Allan Voichuk
text: Good food. Open later than most places in Brier Creek. Good vegetarian options. They even have vegan cheese that has a decent flavor.

name: Destiny Leadership
text: Service was fast and wait was not too long on a busy day. Waiter was very kind and attentive . I love the decor and large TVs to watch sports.

name: Peter Lawless
text: Been here two times, each time it has not been especially busy yet it takes about 45 minutes from placing your order until it comes out to your table.  Food is really yummy, but not worth the price or the wait.

name: lovey allen
text: The BBQ chicken pizza is Awesome

name: Joseph Steiner
text: Their pizzas always have the best crust. They also do not disappoint if you decide to go for dessert. I highly recommend the Reese's peanut butter cookie sundae if you are feeling up for it. Unfortunately the paper straws are not very good and taste like a popsicle stick, but you do not need to use anyway so it does not really matter.

name: Alexis Riley
text: Best pizza ever!

name: Nathan Foust
text: Great atmosphere they even have a place for kids to play outside. Pizza is out of this world and the staff is extremely helpful and pleasant. I highly recommend the Holy shiitake pizza. For pizza its definitely more pricey than your average chain but there is a major quality hike to go with it. Worth every penny.

name: Kirsten Benzaquen
text: The food is always good here, but at this particular location, the service is very slow and inattentive. I’ve been here several times where the server just disappears and doesn’t seem to reappear for a good 20-30 minutes. Every time, it’s …More

name: Elizabeth Burns
text: Very cool atmosphere and love all of the parking. We waited two weeks after opening to visit but I think there are still some kinks being worked out. Our waitress was very attentive, but the food was super slow. It took about an hour to …More

name: Mary Adams
